mapper.sql: id, alm_short_name,alm_application_id,project_id,project_name, app_name, invoked_total, invoked_success_total, invoked_fail_total, create_time, monitor_date, operator, operator_id, paas_id, status, if_del, t_sla_list_id, url,operator_time,remark1, remark2,assess_status,cancel_assess_reason
mapper.insert: insert into t_sla_monitor (id, alm_short_name,alm_application_id,project_id,project_name,app_name, invoked_total, invoked_success_total, invoked_fail_total, create_time, monitor_date, operator, operator_id, paas_id, status, if_del,t_sla_list_id, url, operator_time, remark1, remark2,assess_status,cancel_assess_reason ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{almShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{almApplicationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invokedTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invokedSuccessTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invokedFailTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{monitorDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paasId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ifDel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tSlaListId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,#{assessStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},#{cancelAssessReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update t_sla_monitor
cancel_assess_reason = #{cancelAssessReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
assess_status = #{assessStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT IF(m.b_id IS NOT NULL,1,0) AS selected,m.supplier,m.supplier_id as supplierId FROM (SELECT a.supplier,a.supplier_id,b.b_id FROM(SELECT supplier,supplier_id FROM t_sla_supplier WHERE project_name=#{projectName}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT supplier,supplier_id AS b_id FROM t_sla_outage_supplier_relation WHERE t_sla_monitor_id=#{id}) b ON a.supplier_id=b.b_id) m
